result.reason: Current implementation signals activity on window title changes only. Detecting arbitrary terminal output in embedded PuTTY is technically challenging without hooks or screen scraping. Need clarification if the user requires signaling on any output, on bell events, or if the title-based signaling is malfunctioning.
result.approach: Investigate if PuTTYNG supports output notification or if window hooks can detect paint/bell events reliably.
